main_topic.author: Valentin Werner
main_topic.title: Download Llama3 Models from Kaggle?
main_topic.content: Is there a way for me to download the Llama3 Models that were trained by others from Kaggle? I am talking about the model that is used in all the top scoring public notebooks. When I click on the dataset, I only see a placeholder file with about 30 MB of data.

comments.author: Kishan Vavdara
comments.content: They are lora weights, you can take llama-3 model from kaggle and add lora weights for further training/inference.
comments.date: Posted 2 months ago  ·  38th in this Competition

reply.author: Valentin WernerTopic Author
reply.content: Ah, I have never used lora weights before like this. Thank you for the clarification!
reply.date: Posted 2 months ago  ·  38th in this Competition
